Package com.mhealthatlas.rating.controller

Class RatingQueryController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.rating.controller.RatingQueryController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/ratings")
public class RatingQueryController
extends java.lang.Object
RatingQueryController is the class containing all API endpoints for quering ratings and questionnaires.

    RatingQueryController()

    Queries the rating service database for application versions assigned (with respect to taxonomy classes) to an expert for evaluation.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • getAssignedApplicationVersionTaxonomyClasses

      @GetMapping("/assigned-applications") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AssignedApplicationVersionTaxonomyClassesDto> getAssignedApplicationVersionTaxonomyClasses​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the rating service database for application versions assigned (with respect to taxonomy classes) to an expert for evaluation.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /ratings/assigned-applications

      Only experts are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing found applications

    • getAssignedQuestions

      @GetMapping("/assigned-applications/{appVersionTaxonomyClassId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AssignedQuestionsDto> getAssignedQuestions​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long appVersionTaxonomyClassId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the rating service database for questions assigned to an expert for a given application version taxonomy class.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /ratings/assigned-applications/{appVersionId}

      Only experts are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      appVersionTaxonomyClassId - the application version taxonomy class id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the found questions;
      404 NOT_FOUND response, otherwise;

    • getQuestionnaires

      @GetMapping("/questionnaires") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_Content_Manager\', \'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionnairesDto> getQuestionnaires()
      Queries the rating service database for questionnaires.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /ratings/questionnaires

      Only experts or content manager are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the found questionnaires

    • getQuestionnaire

      @GetMapping("/questionnaires/{questionnaireId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_Content_Manager\', \'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionnaireDto> getQuestionnaire​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long questionnaireId)
      Queries the rating service database by a given questionnaire id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /ratings/questionnaires/{questionnaireId}

      Only experts or content manager are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      questionnaireId - the questionnaire id
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the found questionnaire;
      404 NOT_FOUND otherwise;
